text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump @GEHealthcare The aide, Brian Harrison, had joined the department after running a dog-breeding business for six years. Five sources say some officials in the White House derisively called him “the dog breeder.” https://t.co/q90mR2qbdN
